comments.text: This is really cool! Thanks to the MTG dev team for their hard work and also allowing me and other creators to post raw gameplay. I decided to show all of it to you guys right off the bat, completely unedited and uncut, to let the game do the talking. If you would like to hear my input, that's in the 2nd half of the video. Overall, I think they are on the right path and they have the correct team to make this happen. As a moto gamer, I am extremely excited for this game and can't wait for it's release! Feel free to let me know what you guys think in the comments, the more opinions the better, that is how progress is made. Thanks again to the MTG team (JV this track is unbelievable), keep working hard guys the community see's it and appreciates it!
comments.author: @troyjannn

comments.text: One thing of note, is that when they are changing the weather, they do not end the game running in UE5, the game is just paused and still simulating, the change in weather happened with the game running live, it is also called dynamic weather meaning this is indicating that the game will be able to change weather dynamically during game play and mid races.This can lead to very unique challenges and races not really seen elsewhere. I am excited to see the future of this game!

comments.text: I’ve always wanted to be able to race mini’s, specifically like start on an 85 or supermini work up hitting all the amateur nationals basically like in real life. It looks like will have the tracks and bikes to do that. Also building out my bikes is one of favorite things to do. As a console guy my legends gives you that but there’s still things you can’t change like triple clamp brands, linkage, clutch cover. They have suspension but being able to decide if you want it to be coated, anodized, air or spring etc.. I’m really looking forward to this game.
